title: B.B. Fish
synopsis: At the time of the ceremony of entry to the college, a young boy named Ushino Hayama finds Sara a girl whom he met ten years ago. From this day, a change has taken place in him, and notices that can now control some water. After having succeeded the swimming championships, he discovers deep sea diving.
voices: ['Shinohara, Emi', 'Canna, Nobutoshi', 'Sugawara, Masashi', 'Orikasa, Ai', 'Midorikawa, Hikaru', 'Chafurin', 'Amano, Yuri']
staff: [['Ishikawa, Mitsuhisa', ['Producer']], ['Hamatsu, Mamoru', ['Director', ' Script']], ['Chiba, Kouichi', ['Sound Director']], ['Takeda, Yuusuke', ['Art Director']]]
